column3: News;Kampong Speu:------ Police forces in Samrong Torng district arrested a man after a violent incident at 12:05 PM
column6: a 29-year-old male from Chhorn Ton Pung
column9: an 18 year old female. Suffering from severe ------head injuries
column10: the victim was sent to a private clinic by her family. ------According to the confession
column11: the suspect confesses that he hit the victim with a farm tool
column12: and admitted to being an alcoholic.------Currently
column13: the suspect and evidence have been sent to the district criminal authorities.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/375302
